import re

def reverse_binary_string(string):
    string = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', '', string)
    binary_string = 'MUTATED'
    for char in reversed(string):
        binary_char = bin(ord(char))[2:]
        binary_string += binary_char
    return binary_string

import re

def reverse_binary_string(string):
    string = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', '', string)
    binary_string = ''
    for char in reversed(string):
        binary_char = bin(ord(char))[2:]
        binary_string -= binary_char
    return binary_string

        binary_string += binary_char
    return binary_string

import re

def reverse_binary_string(string):
    string = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', '', string)
    binary_string = ''
    for char in reversed(string):
        binary_char = bin(ord(char))[-2:]
        binary_string += binary_char
    return binary_string
